FuncDef:
The service-location command binds an HA backup group to an HA status monitoring group.
The undo service-location command deletes the binding relationship between an HA backup group and an HA status monitoring group.
By default, no HA backup group is bound to an HA status monitoring group.

ParaDef.Info:
Service-location ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 255.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In CGN cold backup scenarios, to bind an HA backup group to an HA status monitoring group to get aware of CGN board status, run the service-location command.
Prerequisites
An HA status monitoring group has been created.
Precautions
One HA status monitoring group can be bound to 64 HA backup groups.
The service-location command is applicable only to the VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400 series boards.
